title: North-South MRT Line breakdown during evening peak hours

title_translations.zh-Hans: 南北线晚高峰时段故障
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Laluan MRT Utara-Selatan semasa waktu puncak petang
title_translations.ta: மாலை நேர நெரிசல் நேரத்தில் வடக்கு-தெற்கு எம்ஆர்டி பாதையில் ஏற்பட்ட தடங்கல்

updates.text: Train services on the northbound North-South MRT Line - between Marina Bay and Bishan stations - resumed at 11.40pm on Thursday.

Thousands were stranded after the North-South MRT Line broke down during the evening peak hours. Some commuters used a fire extinguisher to break the windows of a train stuck underground due to lack of ventilation.
